verses.verse: And <WG2532> there was given<WG1325> me<WG3427> a reed<WG2563> like unto<WG3664> a rod:<WG4464> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> angel<WG32> stood,<WG2476> saying,<WG3004> Rise,<WG1453> and<WG2532> measure<WG3354> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> altar,<WG2379> and<WG2532> them that worship<WG4352> therein.<WG1722> <WG846>

But <WG2532> the<WG3588> court<WG833> which is without<WG1855> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> leave<WG1544> out,<WG1854> and<WG2532> measure<WG3354> it<WG846> not;<WG3361> for<WG3754> it is given<WG1325> unto the<WG3588> Gentiles:<WG1484> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> holy<WG40> city<WG4172> shall they tread under foot<WG3961> forty and two<WG5062> <WG1417> months.<WG3376>

And <WG2532> I will give<WG1325> power unto my<WG3450> two<WG1417> witnesses,<WG3144> and<WG2532> they shall prophesy<WG4395> a thousand two hundred and threescore<WG5507> <WG1250> <WG1835> days,<WG2250> clothed<WG4016> in sackcloth.<WG4526>

These <WG3778> are<WG1526> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> olive trees,<WG1636> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> candlesticks<WG3087> standing<WG2476> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> if any man<WG1536> will<WG2309> hurt<WG91> them,<WG846> fire<WG4442> proceedeth<WG1607> out of<WG1537> their<WG848> mouth,<WG4750> and<WG2532> devoureth<WG2719> their<WG848> enemies:<WG2190> and<WG2532> if any man<WG1536> will<WG2309> hurt<WG91> them,<WG846> he<WG846> must<WG1163> in this manner<WG3779> be killed.<WG615>

These <WG3778> have<WG2192> power<WG1849> to shut<WG2808> heaven,<WG3772> that<WG2443> it rain not<WG1026> <WG3361> <WG5205> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of their<WG848> prophecy:<WG4394> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> waters<WG5204> to turn<WG4762> them<WG846> to<WG1519> blood,<WG129> and<WG2532> to smite<WG3960> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> with all<WG3956> plagues,<WG4127> as often as<WG3740> they will.<WG2309> <WG1437>

And <WG2532> when<WG3752> they shall have finished<WG5055> their<WG848> testimony,<WG3141> the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> that ascendeth<WG305> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> bottomless pit<WG12> shall make<WG4160> war<WG4171> against<WG3326> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> shall overcome<WG3528> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> kill<WG615> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> their<WG848> dead bodies<WG4430> shall lie in<WG1909> the<WG3588> street<WG4113> of the<WG3588> great<WG3173> city,<WG4172> which<WG3748> spiritually<WG4153> is called<WG2564> Sodom<WG4670> and<WG2532> Egypt,<WG125> where<WG3699> also<WG2532> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> was crucified.<WG4717>

And <WG2532> they of<WG1537> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> and<WG2532> kindreds<WG5443> and<WG2532> tongues<WG1100> and<WG2532> nations<WG1484> shall see<WG991> their<WG848> dead bodies<WG4430> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> and<WG2532> a half,<WG2255> and<WG2532> shall not<WG3756> suffer<WG863> their<WG848> dead bodies<WG4430> to be put<WG5087> in<WG1519> graves.<WG3418>

And <WG2532> they that dwell<WG2730> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> shall rejoice<WG5463> over<WG1909> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> make merry,<WG2165> and<WG2532> shall send<WG3992> gifts<WG1435> one to another;<WG240> because<WG3754> these<WG3778> two<WG1417> prophets<WG4396> tormented<WG928> them that dwelt<WG2730> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> after<WG3326> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> and<WG2532> a half<WG2255> the Spirit<WG4151> of life<WG2222> from<WG1537> God<WG2316> entered<WG1525> into<WG1909> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> they stood<WG2476> upon<WG1909> their<WG848> feet;<WG4228> and<WG2532> great<WG3173> fear<WG5401> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> them which saw<WG2334> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> they heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> saying<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Come up<WG305> hither.<WG5602> And<WG2532> they ascended up<WG305> to<WG1519> heaven<WG3772> in<WG1722> a cloud;<WG3507> and<WG2532> their<WG848> enemies<WG2190> beheld<WG2334> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> the same<WG1565> hour<WG5610> was<WG1096> there a great<WG3173> earthquake,<WG4578> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> tenth part<WG1182> of the<WG3588> city<WG4172> fell,<WG4098> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> earthquake<WG4578> were slain<WG615> of<WG3686> men<WG444> seven<WG2033> thousand:<WG5505> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> remnant<WG3062> were<WG1096> affrighted,<WG1719> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> glory<WG1391> to the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of heaven.<WG3772>
The <WG3588> second<WG1208> woe<WG3759> is past;<WG565> and, behold,<WG2400> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> woe<WG3759> cometh<WG2064> quickly.<WG5035>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> seventh<WG1442> angel<WG32> sounded;<WG4537> and<WG2532> there were<WG1096> great<WG3173> voices<WG5456> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> saying,<WG3004> The<WG3588> kingdoms<WG932> of this world<WG2889> are become<WG1096> the kingdoms of our<WG2257> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> of his<WG848> Christ;<WG5547> and<WG2532> he shall reign<WG936> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> four and twenty<WG5064> <WG2532> <WG1501> elders,<WG4245> which sat<WG2521> before<WG1799> God<WG2316> on<WG1909> their<WG848> seats,<WG2362> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> their<WG848> faces,<WG4383> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God,<WG2316>

saying, <WG3004> We give thee thanks,<WG2168> <WG4671> O Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> Almighty,<WG3841> which art, and wast, and art to come;<WG3801> because<WG3754> thou hast taken<WG2983> to thee thy<WG4675> great<WG3173> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> hast reigned.<WG936>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> nations<WG1484> were angry,<WG3710> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> wrath<WG3709> is come,<WG2064> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> time<WG2540> of the<WG3588> dead,<WG3498> that they should be judged,<WG2919> and<WG2532> that thou shouldest give<WG1325> reward<WG3408> unto thy<WG4675> servants<WG1401> the<WG3588> prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> to the<WG3588> saints,<WG40> and<WG2532> them that fear<WG5399> thy<WG4675> name,<WG3686> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great;<WG3173> and<WG2532> shouldest destroy<WG1311> them which destroy<WG1311> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> of God<WG2316> was opened<WG455> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> there was seen<WG3700> in<WG1722> his<WG848> temple<WG3485> the<WG3588> ark<WG2787> of his<WG848> testament:<WG1242> and<WG2532> there were<WG1096> lightnings,<WG796> and<WG2532> voices,<WG5456> and<WG2532> thunderings,<WG1027> and<WG2532> an earthquake,<WG4578> and<WG2532> great<WG3173> hail.<WG5464>
